text: Mirza Sultan Raja (4 September 1937 – 17 November 2013) was a Jatiya Samajtantrik Dal (Siraj) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Chuadanga-2. ==Career== Raja was a veteran of Bangladesh liberation war. He was elected to parliament from Chuadanga-2 as a Jatiya Samajtantrik Dal candidate in 1986. He contested the 1996 and 2001 elections as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate but lost both elections. ==References== Category:Jatiya Samajtantrik Dal (Siraj) politicians Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:1937 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Awami League politicians
title: Mirza Sultan Raja
